Package farm.game

Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • farm.game.Animal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FarmItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chicken, Horse, Pig
    public class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
implements FarmItem
    This class implements the base class for all animals.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Megan Steenkamp, Lewis Marshall

      • Animal

        public Animal​(int id,
              float price,
              java.lang.String type,
              java.lang.String description,
              int happiness,
              int health)
        Class constructor for the Animal class
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the animal type
        price - the price of the animal
        type - the breed of the animal
        description - a general description of the breed of animal
        happiness - the happiness status of the animal
        health - the health status of the animal

      • addToHealth

        public void addToHealth​(int bonus)
        Adds to the health of an animal by a given amount. Health can be deducted but cannot fall below zero.
        Parameters:
        bonus - the amount of points to add to the animal's health.

      • addToHappiness

        public void addToHappiness​(int bonus)
        Adds to the happiness of an animal by a given amount. Happiness can be deducted but cannot fall below zero.

        bonus - the amount of points to add to the animal's happiness.
